languages.text: {n}Атака сметает странное существо, так долго обитавшее в вашем корабле. Странно — вам кажется, что Номос легко могли среагировать, но будто не пожелали отбить атаку. А еще вам кажется, что на прощание вы услышали "Вернемся" где-то на грани слуха...{/n}

{n}You obliterate the strange creature that has dwelt on your ship for so long, but... you cannot shake the feeling that Nomos could have easily blocked the attack, yet seemed unwilling to do so. And you could swear that in that moment, you heard words somewhere at the edge of your hearing: "We will return."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Атака сметает странное существо, так долго обитавшее в вашем корабле. Странно — вам кажется, что Номос легко могли среагировать, но будто не пожелали отбить атаку. А еще вам кажется, что на прощание вы услышали "Вернемся" где-то на грани слуха...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The attack sweeps the strange creature that has been living on your ship for so long. That is odd — you think that Nomos would have easily parried the attack, but seemed unwilling to do so. And you think that you have heard his last words before departing, somewhere at the edge of your hearing: 'I will be back'.{/n}

{n}The attack sweeps the strange creature that has been living on your ship for so long. That is odd — you think that Nomos would have easily parried the attack, but seemed unwilling to do so. And you think that you have heard his last words before departing, somewhere at the edge of your hearing: 'I will be back'.{/n}

{n}The attack sweeps the strange creature that has been living on your ship for so long. That is odd. You think that Nomos would have easily parried the attack, but seemed unwilling to do so. And you think that you have heard his last words before departing, somewhere at the edge of your hearing: 'I will be back'.{/n}

{n}The attack sweeps the strange creature that has been living on your ship for so long. That is odd. You think that Nomos would have easily parried the attack, but seemed unwilling to do so. And you think that you have heard his last words before departing, somewhere at the edge of your hearing: 'I will be back'.{/n}

{n}You obliterate the strange creature that has dwelt on your ship for so long, but... you cannot shake the feeling that Nomos could have easily blocked the attack, yet seemed unwilling to do so. And you could swear that in that moment, you heard words somewhere at the edge of your hearing: "We will return."{/n}

{n}You obliterate the strange creature that has dwelt on your ship for so long, but... you cannot shake the feeling that Nomos could have easily blocked the attack, yet seemed unwilling to do so. And you could swear that in that moment, you heard words somewhere at the edge of your hearing: "We will return."{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous anéantissez la créature étrange qui vivait depuis si longtemps sur votre vaisseau, mais... vous ne pouvez pas vous empêcher de penser que Nomos aurait facilement pu parer votre attaque, s'il l'avait voulu. À ce moment, il vous a également semblé entendre des mots à peine perceptibles : "Nous reviendrons."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You obliterate the strange creature that has dwelt on your ship for so long, but... you cannot shake the feeling that Nomos could have easily blocked the attack, yet seemed unwilling to do so. And you could swear that in that moment, you heard words somewhere at the edge of your hearing: "We will return."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous anéantissez la créature étrange qui vivait depuis si longtemps sur votre vaisseau, mais... vous ne pouvez pas vous empêcher de penser que Nomos aurait facilement pu parer votre attaque, s'il l'avait voulu. À ce moment, il vous a également semblé entendre des mots à peine perceptibles : "Nous reviendrons."{/n}

languages.text: {n}Destruyes a la extraña criatura que lleva tanto tiempo habitando tu nave, pero... no puedes evitar sentir que Nomos podría haber bloqueado el ataque con facilidad, pero parece que ha decidido no hacerlo. Y también jurarías que, en ese momento, has podido escuchar unas palabras en el límite de tu audición: «Volveremos».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You obliterate the strange creature that has dwelt on your ship for so long, but... you cannot shake the feeling that Nomos could have easily blocked the attack, yet seemed unwilling to do so. And you could swear that in that moment, you heard words somewhere at the edge of your hearing: "We will return."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El ataque barre a la extraña criatura que lleva tanto tiempo habitando tu nave. Es extraño: sabes que Nomos podría haber bloqueado el ataque con facilidad, pero parece que ha decidido no hacerlo. Y también te parece oír sus últimas palabras antes de desaparecer, en el límite de tu audición: «Volveré».{/n}

languages.text: {n}你消灭了那只在你的船上生活了很久的生物，然而……某种古怪的感觉却挥之不去。诺莫斯本可以轻而易举地挡住你的攻击，但它似乎并不愿意这么做。当它倒下的那一刻，你感觉到意识边缘的某个地方回响起了它的声音。“我们还会回来的。”{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You obliterate the strange creature that has dwelt on your ship for so long, but... you cannot shake the feeling that Nomos could have easily blocked the attack, yet seemed unwilling to do so. And you could swear that in that moment, you heard words somewhere at the edge of your hearing: "We will return."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的攻击穿过了诺莫斯，那只在你的船上生活了很久的生物。他的反应很古怪，你本以为他会轻而易举地避开你的攻击，但他似乎并不愿意这么做。当他倒下的时候，你感觉你似乎听到了他最后的话，回荡在你听觉边缘的某个地方。“我还会回来的。”{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du tötest die seltsame Kreatur, die so lange auf deinem Schiff gelebt hat, aber ... du wirst das Gefühl nicht los, dass Nomos den Angriff leicht hätte abwehren können, dazu aber offenbar willens war. Außerdem könntest du schwören, dass du irgendwo am Rande deiner Wahrnehmung Worte gehört hast: "Wir kommen wieder."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You obliterate the strange creature that has dwelt on your ship for so long, but... you cannot shake the feeling that Nomos could have easily blocked the attack, yet seemed unwilling to do so. And you could swear that in that moment, you heard words somewhere at the edge of your hearing: "We will return."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Angriff reißt die merkwürdige Kreatur mit, die so lange auf deinem Schiff gelebt hat. Sonderbar. Du glaubst, dass Nomos den Angriff mühelos hätte parieren können, offenbar aber nicht gewillt war, das zu tun. Und du glaubst, dass du vor seinem Verschwinden seine letzten Worte gehört hast, irgendwo am Rande deines Bewusstseins: "Ich komme wieder."{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは長い間、自分の船に住み着いていた奇妙な生物を消し去った。けれど…ノモスならば簡単に攻撃をかわせはずなのに、そうしたくなかったようだという奇妙な感覚が拭えなかった。そしてその瞬間、あなたはどこからともなく響く彼の言葉を耳にしたように思った。「私は戻ってくる」{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You obliterate the strange creature that has dwelt on your ship for so long, but... you cannot shake the feeling that Nomos could have easily blocked the attack, yet seemed unwilling to do so. And you could swear that in that moment, you heard words somewhere at the edge of your hearing: "We will return."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは長い間、自分の船に住み着いていた奇妙な生物を消し去った。けれど…ノモスならば簡単に攻撃をかわせはずなのに、そうしたくなかったようだという奇妙な感覚が拭えなかった。そしてその瞬間、あなたはどこからともなく響く彼の言葉を耳にしたように思った。「私は戻ってくる」{/n}

languages.text: {n}Geminde uzun süredir yaşıyor olan tuhaf yaratığı yok ediyorsun ama... Nomos'un saldırıyı kolaylıkla engelleyebilecekken pek de gönüllü gözükmediği fikrini aklından çıkaramıyorsun. O anda kulağına "Geri döneceğiz." diye fısıldandığına yemin edebilirsin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You obliterate the strange creature that has dwelt on your ship for so long, but... you cannot shake the feeling that Nomos could have easily blocked the attack, yet seemed unwilling to do so. And you could swear that in that moment, you heard words somewhere at the edge of your hearing: "We will return."{/n}
